textframe.text: Hello, my name is VI.
I'm a virtual pet that now lives inside your head!
Cool huh!
My home is a Soul Device embedded to your skull.
A Soul Device is an interbody computer that can interpret signals, help you manage your items and much more
To access the Soul Device press TAB.
You got a new weapon sticker!
Use [color=#1F51FF]Grenade Launcher[/color] to do big damage.
To change weapons, click [color=#1F51FF]Grenade Launcher[/color] sticker during battle.
She's dead.
But you have the memory card.

questionframe.text: Upload the girl to your Soul Device?

textframe.text: Uhh.. my stomach..
Wait a second! Where's my stomach!!
What... the...
Allow me to introduce us.
My name is Vi and this is my user Rain-
Hey you are the mute guy!
and you've been uploaded to a Soul Device.
But... what happened to my body?
It got killed.
You mean... I'm dead?
Only your body.
Your mind is still perfectly intact in the Soul Device, thanks to Rain!
Huh...
What's your name?
My name... my name is TV
Nice to meet you TV
Hey you're actually kinda cute.
Thank you TV.
What is a Soul Device anyway?
A Soul Device is an inside body computer that can digitize and store human souls.
Every dead body emits a signal, a soul's signal.
If the person has only passed away recently, the soul can still be digitized.
but if the dead is not recent, well, the soul turns into a ghost, that must be put down.
So far we've erased a couple ghost signals but it's highly likely we face more.
How.. how much time do you have to digitize a soul?!
It depends on the soul.
Well what are we waiting for, we must go and kill that hooded guy!
Please, make yourself comfortable at the Soul Device.
You got 2 new Kanjis!
You can check them in your Soul Device in the Kanji submenu.
I sense disturbance signals in this area.
We should erase the signals to get further.
That was a deprecated soul turned into a ghost.
There's no hope for them so we're better of erasing them.
Erasing a ghost signal often gets you money and sometimes other goodies.
So if you see one, erase one!
By the way what's your story Rain?
How did you end up here? Don't you wanna get out?
Oh that's right, you can't talk.
Sorry for calling you a retard back there...
You got a new sticker to your gun! [color=#1F51FF]Crit Wheel[/color]
shoot on red for extra damage!
It's a trash can.

questionframe.text: There's a sock inside the trash can. Take it?

textframe.text: You got Pink Sock.
It's an empty trash can.
Shouldn't we help that girl?
You got Bracelet.
She's... dead.
But her body is still fresh.
If we had a memory card, we could load her up to your Soul Device.

questionframe.text: It's an angle grinder. Take it?

textframe.text: You got [color=#39FF14]Angle Grinder[/color].

questionframe.text: It's a memory card. Take it?

textframe.text: You got [color=#39FF14]Memory Card[/color].
This chain could be cut with a tool, but you don't have one.

questionframe.text: Cut the chain with the Angle Grinder?

textframe.text: This chain could be cut with a tool, but you don't have one.

questionframe.text: Cut the chain with the Angle Grinder?
